summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Dubai SR e-commerce platform after UI redesign. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend luxury boutique design is beautiful and functional, but checkout page has critical JavaScript error preventing order completion.

integration_issues.issue: JavaScript runtime error: 'object is not iterable (cannot read property Symbol(Symbol.iterator))' preventing checkout completion

passed_tests: Backend API health check (200 OK)
Database seeding with 4 categories and 8 products
Category endpoints - Get all categories and individual category
Product endpoints - Get products, by ID, by slug, with filters
Brand endpoints - Get all unique brands
Cart operations - Add, update, remove items
Coupon validation - WELCOME10 (10% off) and FLAT500 (â‚¹500 off)
Cart coupon application and removal
Order creation with COD payment method
Order retrieval by ID
Admin login page accessibility (/admin/login)
Homepage luxury hero section with soft pink theme
Categories section with elegant design
Featured products section loading correctly
Testimonials section with luxury styling
Shop page with filters (category, brand, new arrivals, sale)
Product detail page with size selection and add to cart
Add to cart functionality working with success notifications
Cart page with quantity controls and coupon application (WELCOME10 applied successfully)
WhatsApp floating button with correct number (918595371004)
Mobile responsiveness - filter button and navigation working
Luxury boutique design with Playfair Display typography and soft pink theme
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical JavaScript error on checkout page: 'object is not iterable (cannot read property Symbol(Symbol.iterator))' in CheckoutPage component. This prevents users from completing orders.
